scripts.build: rimraf dist && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config config/webpack.client.js
scripts.build:server: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --mode production --config config/webpack.server.js
scripts.start: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production node index.js | npx pino-tee warn ./logs/warn > ./logs/all
